case_address_found_1: 450 ft S/O Cuddyback Rd., 3.3 mi E/O State Route 395, 13.7 mi N/O SR 58
case_circumstances: John Doe #07-06 is a light-skinned White or Hispanic elderly male, age between mid 50s to mid 80s.  He stood approximately 66 "and was estimated to be heavyset (probably over 250 lbs), with light-brown or blonde hair, found buried in a shallow grave 02/25/06 at 1400 hours in a remote desert area north of Kramer Junction.  It was estimated that he was buried 2-6 months prior to discovery.  The body was clad only in an adult diaper.  Odontology estimates that he had been edentulous (without teeth) for over 20 years and likely wore dentures.
case_clothing_on_body: Only article covering body was an adult diaper
